hero.title: Communicate without
hero.subtitle: Meeshy automatically translates your messages in real-time using AI, directly in your browser. No data leaves your device.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.tagline: Connect the world, one translation at a time
mission.description: We believe that language barriers should never stand in the way of meaningful connections. Our platform empowers people from all corners of the globe to communicate freely, breaking down the walls that separate us and building bridges of understanding.

signature.line2: by developers who believe communication should have no boundaries.

features.title: Why choose Meeshy?
features.subtitle: A modern messaging platform that breaks language barriers

universalTranslation.title: Universal Translation
universalTranslation.description: Support for over 15 languages with advanced AI models (MT5 and NLLB)

autoDetection.title: Automatic Detection
autoDetection.description: Automatically detects message language for more accurate translation.

privacy.title: 100% Private
privacy.description: Client-side translation only. Your data stays on your device.

realtime.title: Real-time
realtime.description: Messages translated instantly with typing indicators and presence.

groupChats.title: Group Conversations
groupChats.description: Create multilingual groups and manage permissions easily.

multiLanguage.title: Custom Multi-Language
multiLanguage.description: Configure your system and regional languages for a tailored experience.

modernInterface.title: Modern Interface
modernInterface.description: Responsive and intuitive design for an optimal user experience.

internationalColleagues.title: International Colleagues
internationalColleagues.description: Communicate with your foreign colleagues without worrying about language barriers.

multilingualClassrooms.title: Multilingual Classrooms
multilingualClassrooms.description: Exchange with your classmates in their native language, no matter where they come from.
